overview: They say there's a thin line between love and hate, and Lesbian Rivals does nothing to dispel that myth. Watch as these beautiful lesbians go at each other with anger and rage, only to have it turn into insatiable, burning lust. Featuring Aaliyah Love, Chloe Foster, India Summer, Kristy Snow, Shyla Jennings, Veronica Avluv, Daisy Summers, and Prinzess.
title: Lesbian Love Stories 7:  Rivals
